other_tests.findings: Subnormal and delayed cone responses, with distinctive multiphasic b-wave; no clinically significant abnormality in dark-adapted ERGs.
other_tests.changes_over_time: ERG testing was stable at 4 time points over an 8-year period, indicating generalized predominantly inner retinal cone system dysfunction.

other_tests.findings: Likely pathogenic homozygous nonsense mutation and deletion corresponding to exons of CACNA2D4.
